page.title: 10SIR JOHN RUGGLES-BRISE
page.content: The principal house in the area is Spains Hall whose present day owner is Colonel Sir John Ruggles-Brise,Bart., C.B.,O.B.E.(mil),J.P.,D.U.Essex.Sir John was born in 1908 and served in the British Army, Royal Artillery (T.A.).He was Lord Lieutenant of Essex from 1958 to 1978.The estate at Spains Hall consists of twelve farms and woodlands totalling about two thousand five hundred acres.One of the farms is still worked by Sir John.Others are managed by his nephew and heir Timothy Ruggles-Brise who lives with his wife and family at the nearby Spains Hall Farm House.In common with the surrounding area the farm is entirely devoted to arable for which local soils and climate are suitable.The crops cereals,wheat,barley.Catchcrops are beans,peas and oil-seed rape.No stock.
